elastic-search-index.description: The elastic search index to upload data to.

lifetime-rating-elastic-search-index.description: The elastic search index to upload the lifetime ratings. It needs to uploaded to a different index because it does not follow the lifecycle of a normal REVIEW.

app-logo.description: The URL for the logo of the app.

email-time-span.description: The time filter in days to use for sending summary emails.

custom-code-path.description: The path for the custom codee file. Custom code can be executed at different points of time. Only for advanced users.
The path for the custom codee file. Custom code can be executed at different points of time. Only for advanced users.

bug-feature-file.description: The file which contains the weight and keywords for categorizing the user feedback to bugs/features.

topic-keywords-file.description: The file which contains the weight and keywords for categorizing the user feedback to different categories.

algorithm-days-filter.description: The filter in days to apply to filter out the feedbacks. This will be applied while parsing, running algorithms etc.

email-subject-name.description: The subject name for the summary emails.

email-list.description: The list of email addresses to send the summary email.

sendgrid-api-key.description: We use Sendgrid to send emails.

slackbot-run-interval.description: The time interval to filter the feedbacks to send to the slack channel.

slack-hook-url.description: The slack web-hook used to send the slack notifications.

slack-channel.description: The name of the slack channel.
